body_html: Right now we're in the same boat as everybody else because there is no port of TensorFlow to Windows. If somebody can put together a Windows port I'm happy to help with the binary build/deployment. Somebody has already put together a recipe for OS X/Linux available with conda install -c memex tensorflow.
body_text: Right now we're in the same boat as everybody else because there is no port of TensorFlow to Windows.  If somebody can put together a Windows port I'm happy to help with the binary build/deployment.  Somebody has already put together a recipe for OS X/Linux available with conda install -c memex tensorflow.
body: Right now we're in the same boat as everybody else because there is no port of TensorFlow to Windows.  If somebody can put together a Windows port I'm happy to help with the binary build/deployment.  Somebody has already put together a recipe for OS X/Linux available with `conda install -c memex tensorflow`.
